Articles.Content:
Hi, everyone!!

For security reasons, I have to ask you to change your passwords. We had made some changes to the forum security and all users who have a weak password have to change it. If your password is strong enough (combination of upper and lower case letters, numbers and special characters), it is not necessary.

Don\'t worry! Nothing happened and no one\'s personal information is vulnerable. This is only for security reasons, hehe.

Cheers ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
